hadiths.text: İbn Abbas (r.a.) "Nebi (Sallallahu aleyhi ve Sellem) abdest organlarını birer kere yıkayarak abdest aldı" demiştir. Diğer tahric: Bu hadisi Tirmizi Tahare; İbn Mâce, Tahara de tahric etti

chapter.eng-name: The washing of the body parts (i.e., the parts which are washed in ablution) once only while performing ablution
